examples.example: 妈妈每天都会精心准备营养丰富的早饭。

translate.english: Mother prepares nutritious breakfast carefully every day.

examples.example: 我每天都会早起为自己做一顿美味的早饭。

translate.english: I get up early every day to make myself a delicious breakfast.

examples.example: 我很享受每天和家人一起吃早饭的温馨时光。

translate.english: I really enjoy the warm time of having breakfast with my family every day.
